definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這些中藥中就有生長於雲南和貴州的茯苓。

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他專心一志地做生意，在幾年中就賺到許多錢。

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司庫是大多數銀行中主管級別中最低的一級。

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司庫是大多數銀行中主管級別中最低的一級。

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果在整治中發現了更加有害的產品呢？

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠奪了這個國家的財富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的諮詢實踐中，我們改變了程序。

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海馬喜歡住在海藻或鰻草叢中的淺海。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 廣西北部灣經濟區在泛北經濟合作中具有戰略地位。

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，他就是傳說中的“搖滾明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 張靚穎在超級女聲的比賽中表演過這首歌。

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料稱好重量之後，被自動送入攪拌機中。

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提貨單是國際貿易和船運中一種很重要的單據。

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在農業中佔很大部分的是種植業和畜牧業。

definition: to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
